snippet: A Dodgers broadcaster since 1950, Vin Scully, 84, returned last month from an early-season illness, to the relief of those who appreciate his melodic play-by-play.
abstract: Vin Scully, Los Angeles Dodgers broadcaster since 1950, returns to the booth after missing five games with severe cold; fans pondered whether the health scare was going to prompt his retirement.
lead_paragraph: A Dodgers broadcaster since 1950, Vin Scully, 84, returned last month from an early-season illness, to the relief of those who appreciate his melodic play-by-play.

headline.seo: Keeping Scully in Dodgers’ Booth Is Baseball’s Easiest Call
headline.main: Keeping Scully in Booth Is Dodgers’ Easiest Call
headline.print_headline: Keeping Scully in the Booth Is the Dodgers’ Easiest Call
